progetto.network

Class ServerState

  • java.lang.Object
    • progetto.network.ServerState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public final class ServerState
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class holds all the information at room level that are need to the server. A server is composed by a list of room. Each room holds players.
